mutants.original_line: return ''.join((c.upper() if i in indices_set else c for i, c in enumerate(s)))
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((c.upper() if i in indices_set else c for (i, c) in enumerate(s)))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join((c.upper() if i in indices_set else c for i, c in enumerate(s)))
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((c.upper() if i not in indices_set else c for (i, c) in enumerate(s)))
